title: Introduction to Python
description: Get started with Python basics, installation, and running your first code in a Jupyter notebook environment.

content.introduction: Welcome to your first Python lesson! In this interactive session, we'll explore Python fundamentals through a comprehensive Jupyter notebook. The notebook contains hands-on exercises and examples covering data types, control structures, and computational thinking concepts.

sections.title: Getting Started
sections.content:
To begin this lesson, you'll need to download and open the Jupyter notebook. The notebook contains all the code examples, exercises, and explanations you'll need. You can download it using the following command in your terminal:

```bash
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/your-repo/public/data/python_fundamentals.ipynb
```

Once downloaded, you can open it in Jupyter Notebook or JupyterLab to start working through the exercises.

sections.title: What's Inside
sections.content:
The notebook covers:
- Basic Python data types
- Control structures (if statements and loops)
- Functions and their applications
- Two group exercises with complete solutions
- Reflection questions for deeper understanding

content.summary: This interactive notebook will guide you through fundamental Python concepts with practical exercises. Make sure to work through each section carefully and try to complete the exercises before looking at the solutions.

title: Data Types and Variables
description: Learn about Python's core data types, variables, and how to manipulate different kinds of data.

content.introduction: Understanding data types and variables is fundamental to programming in Python. This lesson covers the main data types you'll use in cognitive science research and data analysis.

title: Control Flow
description: Master control structures like conditionals and loops to create dynamic and responsive programs.

title: Functions and Modules
description: Create reusable code with functions and organize your programs using Python modules.

title: Data Analysis with Pandas
description: Analyze and manipulate data effectively using the powerful Pandas library for data science.

title: Data Visualization
description: Create informative and compelling visualizations using matplotlib, seaborn, and other Python libraries.

title: Machine Learning Basics
description: Get introduced to fundamental machine learning concepts and implement simple ML models with scikit-learn.
